# J8 pin out reference for raspberry pi and maybe others

SD card slot up

| #  | name   | name   |
|----|--------|--------|
| 01 | 3.3v   | 5v     |
| 02 | GPIO2  | 5v     |
| 03 | GPIO3  | GND    |
| 04 | GPIO4  | GPIO14 |
| 05 | GND    | GPIO15 |
| 06 | GPIO17 | GPIO18 |
| 07 | GPIO27 | GND    |
| 08 | GPIO22 | GPIO23 |
| 09 | 3.3v   | GPIO24 |
| 10 | GPIO10 | GND    |
| 11 | GPIO9  | GPIO25 |
| 12 | GPIO11 | GPIO8  |
| 13 | GND    | GPIO7  |
| 14 | GPIO0  | GPIO1  |
| 15 | GPIO5  | GND    |
| 16 | GPIO6  | GPIO12 |
| 17 | GPIO13 | GND    |
| 18 | GPIO19 | GPIO16 |
| 19 | GPIO26 | GPIO20 |
| 20 | GND    | GPIO21 |

## Pin numbers from gpioinfo

SD card slot up

| #  | name   | name   | gpio pin | gpio pin |
|----|--------|--------|----------|----------|
| 01 | 3.3v   | 5v     | -        | -        |
| 02 | GPIO2  | 5v     | 2        | -        |
| 03 | GPIO3  | GND    | 3        | -        |
| 04 | GPIO4  | GPIO14 | 4        | 14       |
| 05 | GND    | GPIO15 | -        | 15       |
| 06 | GPIO17 | GPIO18 | 17       | 18       |
| 07 | GPIO27 | GND    | 27       | -        |
| 08 | GPIO22 | GPIO23 | 22       | 23       |
| 09 | 3.3v   | GPIO24 | -        | 24       |
| 10 | GPIO10 | GND    | 10       | -        |
| 11 | GPIO9  | GPIO25 | 9        | 25       |
| 12 | GPIO11 | GPIO8  | 11       | 8        |
| 13 | GND    | GPIO7  | -        | 7        |
| 14 | ID_SDA | ID_SCL | 0        | 1        |
| 15 | GPIO5  | GND    | 5        | -        |
| 16 | GPIO6  | GPIO12 | 6        | 12       |
| 17 | GPIO13 | GND    | 13       | -        |
| 18 | GPIO19 | GPIO16 | 19       | 16       |
| 19 | GPIO26 | GPIO20 | 26       | 20       |
| 20 | GND    | GPIO21 | -        | 21       |
